OmniProcessAsmtQuestionVer.name: OmniProcessAsmtQuestionVer
OmniProcessAsmtQuestionVer.description: Represents a junction between an OmniScript process and an assessment question version.

AssessmentQuestionVersionId.description: Required. The ID of assessment question version associated with the Omni Process assessment question version record.

IsImportant.description: Indicates whether the assessment question version is important (true) or not (false).

IsPrefill.description: Indicates whether the assessment question version is prefilled (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. The name of the Omni Process assessment question version record.

OmniProcessElementId.description: Required. The ID of the Omni Process element associated with the Omni Process assessment question version record.

OmniProcessId.description: Required. The ID of the Omni Process associated with the Omni Process assessment question version record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who created the relationship record.
